Added ~60 lines of 'what/how' content violating core principle: 'Code comments are concise (no long examples)' and CLAUDE.md: 'Comments explain why, not what'

Anti-patterns now show example code (BAD vs GOOD) without explaining why - the example demonstrates the rule. Total reduction: 64 lines (48 from Section 7 + 16 from decimal numbering explanation).
